vote.title: To authorize the Director of Finance and Management, on behalf of the Office of Construction Management, to enter into a construction contract with General Temperature Control for the Department of Public Safetyâ€™s FTA Chiller Replacement Project; to authorize a transfer and expenditure up to $1,986,000.00 within the Safety General Obligations Bond Fund; to authorize an amendment to the 2023 Capital Improvements Budget; and to declare an emergency. vote.description: A motion was made by Shannon G. Hardin, seconded by Nicholas Bankston, that this Ordinance be Approved. The motion carried by the following vote:
